title: PLATES
subtitle: platform of the Internet as a technologically enabled singularity
text: plates is a new operating system and set of devices created to refactor computing as a whole. created from the ground up for web and ai. we are standardising the internet to remove distractions and focus on intention, making sure you get what you need done and nothing else. because it is created specifically for this purpose, it is much more efficient than other solutions and works better than all of them. plates attempts to redefine computing by utilising the full power of your devices to get your moneys worth by using a server-client system and communicating across using our new protocol called WASP (web accelerated subspace protocol).
